languages.text: "Довольно лжи и уверток. Если в тебе осталась хоть капля, хоть тень достоинства детей Империума — сознайся!"
"Enough lies and diversions. If there is even a grain — the barest shadow — of the dignity of the children of the Imperium left within you — confess now!"
languages.original_text: "Довольно лжи и уверток. Если в тебе осталась хоть капля, хоть тень достоинства детей Империума — сознайся!"

traits.locale_text: "Enough lies and diversions. If there is even a grain — the barest shadow — of the dignity of the children of the Imperium left within you — confess now!"
"Enough lies and diversions. If there is even a grain — the barest shadow — of the dignity of the children of the Imperium left within you — confess now!"
"Enough lies and diversions. If there is even a grain — the barest shadow — of the dignity of the children of the Imperium left within you — confess now!"
"Enough lies and diversions. If there is even a grain — the barest shadow — of the dignity of the children of the Imperium left within you — confess now!"

languages.text: “别再继续说谎，试图转移注意力了。如果你心里还有一点点帝国臣民的尊严，哪怕是最微弱的一点点也好，就立刻坦白一切吧！”
languages.original_text: "Enough lies and diversions. If there is even a grain — the barest shadow — of the dignity of the children of the Imperium left within you — confess now!"

traits.locale_text: “别再继续说谎，试图转移注意力了。如果你心里还有一点点帝国臣民的尊严，哪怕是最微弱的一点点也好，就立刻坦白一切吧！”

languages.text: «Basta de mentiras y distracciones. Si le queda un ápice de dignidad, el más mínimo resquicio de lealtad al Imperium, ¡confiese de una vez!».
languages.original_text: "Enough lies and diversions. If there is even a grain — the barest shadow — of the dignity of the children of the Imperium left within you — confess now!"

traits.locale_text: «Basta de mentiras y distracciones. Si le queda un ápice de dignidad, el más mínimo resquicio de lealtad al Imperium, ¡confiese de una vez!».

languages.text: 「嘘とごまかしはもう十分。ひとかけらでも—ごくごく微かな影でも構わない。帝国の子としての尊厳が残っているならば、今すぐ白状せよ！」
languages.original_text: "Enough lies and diversions. If there is even a grain — the barest shadow — of the dignity of the children of the Imperium left within you — confess now!"

traits.locale_text: 「嘘とごまかしはもう十分。ひとかけらでも—ごくごく微かな影でも構わない。帝国の子としての尊厳が残っているならば、今すぐ白状せよ！」

languages.text: "Genug der Lügen und Ablenkungsmanöver. Falls in Euch nur ein Hauch – oder ein Schatten davon – der Würde der Kinder des Imperiums ist, dann gesteht jetzt!"
languages.original_text: "Enough lies and diversions. If there is even a grain — the barest shadow — of the dignity of the children of the Imperium left within you — confess now!"

traits.locale_text: "Genug der Lügen und Ablenkungsmanöver. Falls in Euch nur ein Hauch – oder ein Schatten davon – der Würde der Kinder des Imperiums ist, dann gesteht jetzt!"

languages.text: « Finis les mensonges et les diversions. S'il reste en vous ne serait-ce qu'une once de la dignité des enfants de l'Imperium, passez aux aveux sur-le-champ ! »
languages.original_text: "Enough lies and diversions. If there is even a grain — the barest shadow — of the dignity of the children of the Imperium left within you — confess now!"

traits.locale_text: « Finis les mensonges et les diversions. S'il reste en vous ne serait-ce qu'une once de la dignité des enfants de l'Imperium, passez aux aveux sur-le-champ ! »

languages.text: "Bunca yalan dolan yeter. İmparatorluk tebaasından olmanın getirdiği haysiyetten sende az biraz varsa suçunu itiraf edersin!"
languages.original_text: "Enough lies and diversions. If there is even a grain — the barest shadow — of the dignity of the children of the Imperium left within you — confess now!"

traits.locale_text: "Bunca yalan dolan yeter. İmparatorluk tebaasından olmanın getirdiği haysiyetten sende az biraz varsa suçunu itiraf edersin!"
